Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Kai Enmel Amarndhu, Karththar Ennai Aavikkullaakki Veliye Kondupoi Elumbugal Niraindha Oru Pallaththaakkin Naduvil Niruththi,
2 ennai Avaigalin Aruge Sutri Nadakkappanninaar; Idho, Pallaththaakkin Vettaveliyile Andha Elumbugal Magaa Thiralaaikkidandhadhu; Avaigal Migavum Ularndhadhumaayirundhadhu.
3 avar Ennai Nokki: Manupuththirane, Indha Elumbugal Uyiradaiyumaa Endru Kettaar; Adharku Naan: Karththaraagiya Aandavare, Dhevareer Adhai Ariveer Endren.
4 appozhudhu Avar: Nee Indha Elumbugalaik Kuriththuth Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththu, Avaigalaip Paarththu Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Ularndha Elumbugale, Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal.
5 karththaraagiya Aandavar Indha Elumbugalai Nokki: Idho, Naan Ungalukkul Aaviyaip Pravesikkappannuven; Appozhudhu Uyiradaiveergal.

6 naan Ungalmel Narambugalai Serththu, Ungalmel Maamsaththai Undaakki, Ungalaith Tholinaal Moodi, Ungalil Aaviyaik Kattalaiyiduven; Appozhudhu Neengal Uyiradaindhu, Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolveergalendru Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
7 enakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye Naan Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththen; Naan Theerkkadharisanam Uraikkaiyil Oru Iraichchal Undaayitru; Idho, Asaivundaagi, Ovvoru Elumbum Thanthan Elumbode Serndhukondadhu.
8 naan Paarththukkondirukkaiyil Idho, Avaigalmel Narambugalum Maamsamum Undaayitru, Merpuramengum Tholinaal Moodappattadhu; Aanaalum Avaigalil Aavi Illaadhirundhadhu.

9 appozhudhu Avar Ennaippaarththu: Nee Aaviyai Nokkith Theerkkadharisanam Urai; Manupuththirane, Nee Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththu, Aaviyai Nokki: Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Aaviye, Nee Kaatruththisai Naangilumirundhu Vandhu, Kolaiyunda Ivargal Uyiradaiyumpadikku Ivargalmel Oodhu Engiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
10 enakkuk Karpikkappattapadi Naan Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththen; Appozhudhu Aavi Avargalukkul Pravesikka, Avargal Uyiradaindhu, Kaaloondri, Magaa Periya Senaiyaai Nindraargal.

11 appozhudhu Avar Ennai Nokki: Manupuththirane, Indha Elumbugal Isravel Vamsaththaar Anaivarume; Idho, Avargal Engal Elumbugal Ularndhupoyitru; Engal Nambikkai Atruppoyitru; Naangal Aruppundupogirom Engiraargal.

12 aagaiyaal Nee Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththu, Avargalode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar, Idho, En Janangale, Naan Ungal Predhakkuzhigalaith Thirandhu, Ungalai Ungal Predhakkuzhigalilirundhu Velippadavum, Ungalai Isravel Dhesaththukkuvaravumpannuven.
13 en Janangale, Naan Ungal Predhakkuzhigalaith Thirandhu, Ungalai Ungal Predhakkuzhigalilirundhu Velippadappannumpodhu, Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolveergal.

14 en Aaviyai Ungalukkul Vaippen; Neengal Uyiradaiveergal; Naan Ungalai Ungal Dhesaththil Vaippen; Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolveergal; Idhai Sonnen, Idhai Seyven Endru Karththar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
15 pinnum Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

16 manupuththirane, Nee Oru Kolai Eduththu, Adhile Yoodhaavukkum Adhaichcherndha Isravel Puththirarukkum Aduththadhu Endru Ezhudhi; Pinbu Veroru Kolai Eduththu, Adhile Eppiraayeemukkum Adhaichcherndha Isravel Vamsaththaar Anaivarukkum Aduththa Yoseppin Kolendru Ezhudhi,
17 avaigalai Ore Kolaagumpadi Ondrodondru Isaiyachchey, Avaigal Un Kaiyil Ondraagum.
18 ivaigalin Porul Innadhendru Engalukku Arivikkamaatteero Endru Un Janaththin Puththirar Unnidaththil Kettaal,

19 nee Avargalai Nokki: Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Idho, Eppiraayeemukkum Adhaichcherndha Isravel Koththirangalukkum Aduththa Yoseppin Kolai Eduththu, Adhai Yoodhaavin Kolode Serththu, Avaigalai Ore Kolaakkuven; Avaigal En Kaiyil Ondraagum Engiraar Endru Sol.
20 sollumpodhu, Nee Ezhudhina Kolgal Avargaludaiya Kangalukku Munbaaga Un Kaiyil Irukkavendum.

21 nee Avargalai Nokki: Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Idho, Naan Isravel Vamsaththaarai Avargal Poyirukkum Jaadhigalidaththilirundhu Azhaiththu, Sutrilumirundhu Avargalai Serththu, Avargalai Avargal Suyadhesaththile Varappanni,

22 avargalai Isravelin Malaigalaagiya Dhesaththile Ore Jaadhiyaakkuven; Ore Raajaa Avargal Ellaarukkum Raajaavaaga Iruppaar; Avar Ini Irandu Jaadhigalaaga Iruppadhillai: Avargal Ini Irandu Raajyangalaagap Pirivadhumillai.

23 avargal Inith Thangal Naragalaana Vikkiragangalinaalum Thangal Aruvaruppugalinaalum Thangaludaiya Sagala Meerudhalgalinaalum Thangalaith Theettuppaduththuvadhumillai; Avargal Kudiyirundhu Paavancheydha Ellaa Idangalilirundhum Naan Avargalai Neengalaakki Ratchiththu, Avargalai Suththampannuven; Appozhudhu Avargal En Janamaayiruppaargal, Naan Avargal Dhevanaayiruppen.

24 en Dhaasanaagiya Dhaaveedhu Enbavar Avargalmel Raajaavaaga Iruppaar; Avargal Ellaarukkum Ore Meyppar Iruppaar; Appozhudhu Avargal En Nyaayangalil Nadandhu, En Kattalaigalaik Kaikkondu, Avaigalinpadiye Seydhu,

25 naan En Dhaasanaagiya Yaakkobukkuk Koduththadhum, Ungal Pidhaakkal Kudiyirundhadhumaana Dhesaththile Kudiyiruppaargal; Avargalum Avargal Pillaigalum Avargaludaiya Pillaigalin Pillaigalum Adhile Endrendraikkum Kudiyiruppaargal; En Dhaasanaagiya Dhaaveedhu Enbavar Endrendraikkum Avargalukku Adhipadhiyaayiruppaar.

26 naan Avargalode Samaadhaana Udanpadikkai Seyven; Adhu Avargalukku Niththiya Udanpadikkaiyaayirukkum; Naan Avargalai Nilaippaduththi, Avargalai Varththikkappanni, Avargal Naduvile En Parisuththa Sthalaththai Endrendraikkum Sthaabippen.
27 en Vaasasthalam Avargalidaththil Irukkum, Naan Avargal Dhevanaayiruppen, Avargal En Janamaayiruppaargal.
28 appadiye En Parisuththa Sthalam Avargal Naduvile Endrendraikkum Irukkumpodhu, Naan Isravelaip Parisuththampannugira Karththar Endru Jaadhigal Arindhukolvaargal Engiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
